author: newsr.in
title: Day 9: Will 'Lagaan' task break the team spirit?
text: As the contestants wake up to the famous 'Mitwa' from the movie 'Lagaan', the theme for Day 9 in the Bigg Boss house is unknowingly set. The first conversation in the house revolves around heartbeats almost stopping when Prince declares that he would reclaim his bags for Rs. 30 Lakhs. Staying true to the theme of the song, Bigg ...
